name: Gel Nails!
description:
Those nails need some work. Let's make them beautiful!

Nails Forever is a nail salon game with many different ways to beautify your nails. Work some magic on nails in a variety of different ways. This manicure is truly amazing!

- Various colors to pick and choose
- Satisfying
- Easy to play

Play Now!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
